title: Take Cover (5C40)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert a knight to play a [Gondor] fortification from your discard pile.
Lore:	Gondor forces at Osgiliath were too few to fight the advancing armies in the field.
Rarity:	C
